## UIMaterialParams.setBlendingFactor() method

设置透明材质的混合系数

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setBlendingFactor( srcFactor : BlendFactor, dstFactor : BlendFactor) : void ;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  srcFactor | [BlendFactor](./extractor.blendfactor.md) | 当前像素混合系数 |
|  dstFactor | [BlendFactor](./extractor.blendfactor.md) | 目标像素混合系数 |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
